name: Kieran
text: (This is it. The pantry's wide open)
(No, be calm about this. How many times have you gotten into trouble because you were too eager about it?)
(The owner's at the front, so this is my chance!)
(Alright, it's go time!)
(Heh, too easy. Leaving the bread wide open)
(Finally, something to ea—)
(Huh?)

name: Cafe Owner
text: Hmph. I thought I heard a little rat come in here.

name: Kieran
text: Wh-what?!
(Drat! Where did he come from?!)
(What should I do? The bread's right there, and I can make a run for it. But, can this guy catch up to me? Or should I knock him out first?)

choices.text: Fight him first, then take the bread

text: (Just have to trust my legs here!)

name: Cafe Owner
text: You! You're faster than I thought.
Come back here!

name: Kieran
text: Hah! See ya later, sucker! And, thanks for the meal!
Hah...hah...finally, a decent meal...!
(I take a huge chomp of the freshly baked bread. It was soft, basically melting in my mouth. The best meal I've had in ages.)
Hehe, maybe I should ransack the place again once things settle down there.
Hmm?
Who goes there?!

name: Thug 1
text: Heh. How impressive. I’m surprised you managed to find us out.

name: Kieran
text: (Of course. I’ve lived in these parts my whole life. If I hadn’t honed my senses, I would have died long ago.)
So, I’m assuming you’re here to steal from me, huh? Can’t say I’m surprised. After all, I got myself a huge haul.

name: Thug 1
text: Enough talking! Get him!

name: Kieran
text: Don't you dare-
*BOOM*

name: Thug 2
text: What was that?

name: Thug 1
text: Hmph. Probably some firework or something. Wait, where did he go?!

name: Thug 2
text: Crap, he ran away while we were distracted!

name: Thug 1
text: Argh! You useless good-for-nothing!
(This guy is as jacked as can be. And he probably runs fast too. Can I even outrun him?)
(I’ll just have to knock him unconscious. But, can I do it?)
Argh!
(Wh-what?! I didn't even see him throw a punch!)

name: Cafe Owner
text: Pathetic. I've had better rugrats steal from this place than you.

name: Kieran
text: (Dammit! What was I thinking?! As if I could fight a guy as big as him.)
(He might actually kill me at this rate! C’mon, something, anything! What can I use to stop him?!)
*BOOM*

name: Cafe Owner
text: What was that?
Hmph, anyway- Wait, where did he go?

name: Kieran
text: Hah…hah…
*rumbles*

name: Kieran
text: Crap…forgot to take the the bread with me too…
Guess I’m going hungry today…
No, there are still places I can go to. I’ll scout the place first.

name: Kieran
text: Life has always been unfair to me. Nothing ever seemed to be going well for me.
finish later
